article: A young man and an old man were walking in the park. The old man _ behind the young man. He was tired, so he wanted to have a rest. There was a chair in front of the young man. The old man saw the chair. He wanted to sit on the chair. He walked to the chair. The young man walked to it, too. So the old man began to run. The young man said, " _ sit on the chair!" The old man didn't listen to him. Then he sat on it. He looked happy . The young man came over to him. He was _ a small board _ his hand. It said, "Wet Paint ".
